samahara purushayan hata mema aushadaye athi adhika sanghataka nisa paya hatharaka pamana kalayak awayawaya sankochanaya sandaha wayawenawa.me sandaha oba ganna aaharada balapanawa.ghana piti aahara ganimedi mema kalaya digu wenawa.paya hatharak giya pasuwath sruju bawa elesama pawathinnenam eya suluwen thakanna puluwan deyak nemeyi.ehema wenawanam wahama waidya upades pathiya yuthuyi.boho welawak melesa srujuwa pawathinnenam saila winasha wima siddha wenawa.nawatha yatha thathwayata path kirimatanam sathkam pawa kirimata siduwenawa.
